Title: Directs that certain proceeds from the sale of forfeited property be deposited into the general fund of the respective state or local government of which the claiming agent is an agency or part; repealer
Summary: Directs that certain proceeds from the sale of forfeited property be deposited into the general fund of the respective state or local government of which the claiming agent is an agency or part rather than a law enforcement purposes subaccount.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the distribution of proceeds from forfeited property; and to repeal paragraph (h) of subdivision 2 of section 1349 of such law relating thereto
